attributes.action: bring in a law to make a curfew for children aged 16 and under to be in their homes by 10 pm weeknights& 11pm weekends and school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hopefully this law will stop young hooligans from hanging around causing trouble at night and making our lives a misery. It could be enforced by fining the parents or gaurdians of these trouble-makers thus making the parents be more responsible for their children!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
